name: Slime Game 0.1
description:
A simple 2 player game made using Scratch

By me and my younger sibling within 24 hours

Game controls:  arrow keys and w, a, s, d

Game instruction: avoid the bandits and collect all six donuts

CAUTION WHEN COLLECTING DONUTS may not count up to six. Collect them one by one and not in succession. Mark my words...

Thanks for playing!

:)
